sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import './ad-clients.css' const ADClients = (props) => { const [clients, setClients] = useState([]); const [feedbacks, setFeedbacks] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3001/getClients') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setClients(data)) .catch(error => console.error(error)); fetch('http://localhost:3001/getFeedbacks') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setFeedbacks(data)) .catch(error => console.error(error)); }, []); return (
AD-clients - Superb Arctic Turtle
Updates
Appointments Clients

    Client feedback:

    Clients :

    {clients.map((client, index) => (

  • ID: {client.client_id}

    First Name: {client.client_fname}

    Last Name: {client.client_lname}

    Balance Amount: {client.client_balance_amount}

    • ))}
    {feedbacks.map((feedback, index) => (

  • File ID: {feedback.file_id}

    Feedback Text: {feedback.feedback_text}

    Feedback Date: {feedback.feedback_date}

    • ))} Logout Files Transactions
    ) } export default ADClients
